trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> object that is specified by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Parameters" name="Parameters" href=""></xref> properties of the associated data source control.

The ParameterCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> object at design time, as specified by one of the `Parameters` properties.

The `Parameters` properties include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, and other data source controls.
The ParameterCollectionEditor is invoked by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on one of the `Parameters` properties in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method edits the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> for the associated data source control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ParameterCollectionEditor> class when the page designer selects the ellipsis (**…**) button on one of the `Parameters` properties in the visual designer's **Properties** grid while designing the associated data source control.
Edits the elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> objects of the associated data source control.
The EditValue method extracts the associated data source control and the data source control designer that is associated with that control from the `context` parameter.

The supported data source controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> controls, with their corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner> designers.

Once the data is extracted, the EditValue calls back to the data source control designer to display an editing dialog box that is used to edit a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> object that is referenced by one of the `Parameters` properties of the data source control.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used to acquire context information.
An object implementing the <xref:System.IServiceProvider> through which editing services can be obtained.
The object to edit the value for.
The new value; otherwise, if the value of the object has not changed, value unchanged.
value is .
Gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
The GetEditStyle method always returns the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> value, which indicates that the user interface for the editor is a modal dialog box.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that indicates the context of the object being edited.
The editing style that is associated with this editor.
